lpspline.spline package

Submodules

lpspline.spline.base module

class lpspline.spline.base.Spline(term: str, tag: str | None = None)[source]

Bases: ABC

Abstract base class for all spline types.

add_constraint(*constraints)[source]

Takes in input Constraints. Not all splines can accept all constraints. Raises ValueError depending on the spline type and constraint.

add_penalty(*penalties)[source]

Takes in input Penalties. Not all splines can accept all penalties. Raises ValueError depending on the spline type and penalty.

property coefficients: numpy.ndarray

Returns the coefficients of the spline.

property constraints: List[cvxpy.Constraint]

Returns the constraints of the spline.

eval(x: numpy.ndarray, return_basis: bool = False) → numpy.ndarray[source]

Evaluates the spline expression for the given input x.

Parameters:

x – Input feature array.

Returns:

A numpy array of shape (n_samples,) representing the spline values.

Raises:

ValueError – If no variables are defined for the spline.

init_spline(x: numpy.ndarray, by: numpy.ndarray | None = None)[source]

Initialize core parameters to build spline basis according to train data.

property penalties: List[cvxpy.Expression]

Returns the penalties of the spline.

property tag: str | None

Returns the tag of the spline.

property term: str

Returns the term of the spline.

property variables: List[cvxpy.Variable]

Returns the variables of the spline.
